binding.name: .NET
binding.status: The bindings are still under development. See the gstreamer-sharp module.

binding.name: C++
binding.status: Released. See the gstreamermm GNOME module.

body.p: The GStreamer API C++ bindings are actively developed and based on gtkmm, using the same lifecycle mechanism.
The latest version can be downloaded from the gstreamermm directory on ftp.gnome.org.
Development takes place in GNOME's Git repository and on the gtkmm mailing list , which should also be your first point of contact if you have any queries or would like to help out.

binding.name: Guile
binding.status: Released under the aegis of the guile-gnome project.

body.p: The GStreamer Guile bindings can be technically described as the "Bee's Knees".
Check out the guile-gnome page for details.
